description: This file implements an interactive command-line shell for managing and querying an SQLite database, including commands for listing tables, showing schemas, describing tables, and executing SQL queries.

methods.name: print_help
methods.description: Prints help information about available shell commands.

methods.name: list_tables
methods.description: Lists all tables in the connected SQLite database.

methods.name: show_schema
methods.description: Displays the CREATE statements for tables, either all or a specific one.

methods.name: describe_table
methods.description: Shows the structure of a specified table.

methods.name: execute_query
methods.description: Executes a SQL query and displays the results or affected rows.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that runs the interactive shell loop.
